articles.author: Sergey Goryashko, Pierre Emmanuel Ngendakumana
articles.title: Russia gearing up for decade-long duel with West, Estonia warns - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: Intelligence service notes significant rise in Russian military production.
articles.content: The report notes a significant rise in military production in Russia, including of artillery and armored vehicles, that is enhancing Moscow’s ability to continue fighting. That surge could outpace Uk… [+1467 chars]

articles.author: Pia Krishnankutty
articles.title: How Trump’s NATO-bashing has sent shockwaves throughout Europe - ThePrint
articles.description: Former US President Donald Trump said last week that Russia is free to attack any NATO ally that wasn’t meeting defence spending obligations. Many wonder if it has hurt his presidential bid.
articles.content: The remarks came as Russias invasion of Ukraine nears two years. Incumbent President Joe Biden, who is seeking re-election, called the statement by his predecessor “appalling and unhinged” while NATO… [+4630 chars]
